Introduction

Ryu Sujeong (or simply Sujeong) is a South Korean singer under her own independent label House of Dreams. She is the lead vocalist of the girl group Lovelyz and a former member the project girl group Girls Next Door. Fans nickname her Ryuvely for her adorable charms. Sujeong is also known for her breathtaking ant-waist.

She debuted as a member of Lovelyz with their first studio album Girls' Invasion on November 17, 2014.

She made her solo debut on May 20, 2020, with the mini album Tiger Eyes.

On November 1, 2021, Woollim Entertainment announced that 7 of the members, except Baby Soul, had chosen not to renew their contracts which expired on November 16.

On September 1, 2022, it was announced that Sujeong has established her own one-woman agency House of Dreams, where she would be actively promoting as a solo artist in various fields.
